textContent: If WoW database editor adds easy visualized waypoints (whatever they're called) you could have NPC nodes by making large networks of waypoints and have NPCs spawn and walk around and rely on faction relations to fight. Every kill = add XP to some data structure, more XP = more levels/stats/abilities. There was something like this for Skyrim that was pretty cool, would be much cooler in WoW and more optimized.
